ValidationRule.description: If the Status is 'Transfer to Health Plan', Outreach Type and Outreach Comments must be filled out.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ISPICKVAL(Status,'Transfer to Health Plan') && ( TEXT(Outreach_Type__c) = null || Outreach_Comments__c = null)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: If the Status is 'Transfer to Health Plan', Outreach Type and Outreach Comments must be filled out.
